attributes.action: Reinstate the Walsall to Wolverhampton Railway Line
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Call upon the Prime Minister to arrange for surplus London Midland trains stock be used to reinstate the rail link between Walsall & Wolverhampton. Also support reopening of intermediate station in Willenhall.

rejection.details: This would be a matter for the train company you have mentioned.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
